item.description:
Join us for “un viaje” to the authentic tapas experience here in Hartford with tapas created by a chef from Spain. Here’s the plan: for a cost of $20 there will be a variety of tapas to choose from on a buffet. Beverages are extra. For more information about Costa del Sol visit costadelsolrestaurant.net

This fundraiser will go toward the Spanish Meetup website fee and the cost of paper goods and beverages for meetups. We are a non profit volunteer group so your support of this fund raiser is appreciated.

Questions? Contact Kurt at gringo50@peru.com or Karen at kdwo543210@yahoo.com


¡Espero que nos veamos!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tapas Night and Fundraiser for Spanish Meetup at Costa del Sol
